basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Arjav Prasad! I'm about to graduate with an engineering degree from UBC! I'm a full-stack developer and have relevant experience building applications front to back. I'm self-motivated and have taught myself the programming languages and software systems I've needed up till now.

projects.title: TimeBlox
projects.description: Timeblox is a social accountability dashboard. This Chrome extension takes over the users tab and allows users to set tasks, set timers, track their progress, and see their friends' progress. I was responsible for building out the UI, the share feature, and various client-side data handling.

projects.title: Dawn
projects.description: Dawn is an anonymous dating app for iOS/Android with 100 daily active users. I built the app from scratch with a partner. I was responsible for building the recommendation algorithm, the matching system, the profile creation system, the reveal feature, and many of the onboarding screens.

projects.title: Wine Predictive Modelling
projects.description: This is a Python-based web application that uses machine learning on a database concerned with the chemical properties of wine. I pre-processed the data and applied a model to predict the class of wine given certain parameters. I then deployed the web application using Streamlit.

experience.title: Part-Time Web Developer/Tech Lead
experience.description: Imlemented visual display of tags for easy navigation which improved conversion by 15%. Used Hotjar to analyze scroll heatmaps and improved click-through of buttons. Improved Google page speed scores by 30 points.

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.description: Built Figma website displaying customer journey of crypto-powered purchasing. Website was used in demos for potential investors at tech conventions.
